Stargazer Data API
Table of Contents

Namespace DatePicker

Classes

Calendar

A calendar that can be used to select a date from a set view.

DateButton
MonthView

Displays the days in a month.

YearView

Displays the months of a year.

Interfaces

ICalendarView

A view that dictates how a calendar should be displayed (i.e. MonthView or YearView).

Delegates

Calendar.DateChangedEventHandler

The signal emitted when the date changes.

Calendar.DateSelectedEventHandler

The signal emitted when the user selects a date in ANY view. Emitted when selecting both a month and a day.

Calendar.FinishedEventHandler

The signal emitted when the user is finished selecting a date. Meaning, the user has selected a date in EVERY view (i.e. a month and a day).

Calendar.ViewChangedEventHandler

The signal emitted when the view changes.

Made with docfx
